orderSelect.sortByNewestFirst:
**Functional Purpose**: Option to sort solutions by newest first.
**UI Location**: Profile → Community Solutions List (Sort dropdown menu).
**When Users See This**: When opening the sort order dropdown.
**Technical Context**: Option text within a select component. No variables.
**Current English**: "Sort by Newest First"
orderSelect.sortByOldestFirst:
**Functional Purpose**: Option to sort solutions by oldest first.
**UI Location**: Profile → Community Solutions List (Sort dropdown menu).
**When Users See This**: When opening the sort order dropdown.
**Technical Context**: Option text within a select component. No variables.
**Current English**: "Sort by Oldest First"
orderSelect.sortByMostStarred:

**UI Location**: Profile → Community Solutions List (Sort dropdown menu).
**When Users See This**: When opening the sort order dropdown.
**Technical Context**: Option text within a select component. No variables.
